summary:
You want some Vampire Drugs, you\'re Skooma addict ! You hate wolves and werewolves so make them cry !
Lexi an old and sexy Vampire will teach you how to create drugs and poison for the Hunt. Be careful, wolves are everywhere !
descriptionHtml:
[u][color=red][b][size=10]Vampire Drugs[/size][/color] and [color=green][size=10]Wolves Poison[/size][/b][/color][/u]
[size=3]
[color=grey]
[u]Version 2.0[/u]
The same as the version 1.0 but Lexi tech you how to create some Wolves poisons with own effect, for the Hunt. Also the wolves are more power than before.
Poison only work on wolves & werewolves race & Companions NPC, i hate them, they smell very bad.
[u]Version 1.0[/u] 
[i]Vampires are immune to drugs and cannot feel there good effects.[/i]
Lexi an old and sexy Vampire find a way for us. (at Whiterun Drunken Huntsman)
She can explain you how to create some good Drugs by killing wolves and werewolves.

[i]By mixing wolves and werewolves skin and adding some secrets plants, you will be able to feel alive again. You love Skooma ? You will love Skooma Vampyre.[/i]

There two way of Skooma Vampyre, one will drain you\'re magicka when the other one will drain your stamina. Don\'t forget that eating any part of wolves or werewolves will make you scream, a lot ! 
That the way to feel alive.
[/color]

[color=red][u]With potion :[/u][/color] You can get \"Fire Resist\" and \"Fire Aura\" but you will have to choose between loosing your stamina or your magika. And in any case YOU WILL BURN & CRY.

[Color=green][u]With poison :[/u][/color] You can hunt werewolves and wolves and drop down their endurance. You will do more damage with a better poison. Really useful against the hairy beast, I also talk about the guild companions. Poison can\'t work with other NPC or beast.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Potions and Poisons can be crafted, after reading and keeping the \"Experimental Skooma\" or \"Wolf Slayer\" from Lexi.
You will burn, you will cry, you will be stronger and you will see me around you.

I add some werewolves and wolves around Whiterun, but be careful they are stronger than all other.

You need Dawnguard for this mod. There is no scripts change and should be compatible with everything.

Have fun.

Sumer XVI
[/size]
author: Sumer XVI
